mean_en: to arrange something in groups according to features that they have in common; to decide which type or group somebody/something belongs to
sentence: The color of the bin is what classifies the type of garbage.
sentence_trans: 垃圾箱的颜色可以区分垃圾的类型。
word_etyma: classi\u003dclass分类 + fy使成为... → 把...分类
